job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI, 3D, and motion production innovations to streamline workflows and develop new capabilities within the studio
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on understanding how technical innovations (AI, 3D, motion) can improve and create new business capabilities within the studio's production processes.

job_tasks.phrase: develop new capabilities within the studio
job_tasks.justification: This implies the creation of new functional aspects, which often involves software development to enable these new capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive the development of lean processes and automation solutions across the studio
job_tasks.justification: Developing automation solutions directly points to software development, likely involving scripting or building tools to improve processes.

job_tasks.phrase: optimizing workflows, reducing costs, and ensuring high quality for customer-facing solutions
job_tasks.justification: This describes the outcome of development efforts, specifically in building and improving customer-facing solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Support the integration of new production workflows, tools, and standards.
job_tasks.justification: Integration of workflows and tools often involves development or scripting to ensure seamless operation.

job_tasks.phrase: Act as a bridge between project teams and production to gather insights and improve capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand different parts of the business (project teams, production) to identify areas for improvement, demonstrating business acumen.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with trends in the media landscape, including GenAI, 3D, and motion production, and explore new innovations to enhance customer communication and production processes.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding market trends and how they can be applied to business objectives like enhancing communication and processes.

soft_skills.phrase: Lead collaborations on virtual production, motion artistry, and AI
explore, develop, and establish new production capabilities
Drive the development of lean processes and automation solutions
Act as a bridge between project teams and production to gather insights and improve capabilities.
Stay up-to-date with trends in the media landscape... and explore new innovations

classification.rationale: The job description mentions GenAI and innovation in production processes, but it lacks specific technical depth related to building or fine-tuning AI models. The primary focus appears to be on integrating existing technologies and streamlining workflows, rather than core AI development.
